Articles.Content: About a month ago I tried RSS. Then I got bored and wanted to play my kerbalism game again and after I put it back on steam and start my game and try and load a save it says "save incompatible" Even after I reinstalled all my mods. I hope there is a way to get my save game back

Have you tried verifying the integrity of your files?  How are you installing mods - manually, or through CKAN?  What about the player or error logs?

For information on all of this and what to post when encountering issues, look at this thread:

Save incompatible sounds like you’re using an older version of KSP than the save was made in. If you open the save file in a text editor it’ll tell you at the top what version of KSP it was last used in; if it says 1.12.5, you can probably change that to 1.12.3 with no consequences as .4 and .5 were very minor updates with minimal changes to the code.
